content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)

### Coal Mining Operation at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the target entity has enough capacity to accept the items being inserted. This will prevent errors such as "Could not insert: Item".
